#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
main()
{
	int t,l1,l2;
	char m[50001],w[50001];
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>m>>w;
		l1=strlen(m);
		l2=strlen(w);
		sort(m,m+l1);
		sort(w,w+l2);
		if(l1==l2)
		{
			if(strcmp(m,w)==0)
			cout<<"YES"<<endl;
			else
			cout<<"NO"<<endl;
		}
		else
		cout<<"NO"<<endl;
	}
}
